В том числе и люди, играющие также в эту игру. Если идёте в неё впервые (вообще редко играете в шутеры на ПК),  то готовьтесь учиться стрелять, иначе вы попросту потратите свои нервы и недогования.

honestly what a garbage game you can't compete unless ur using ak or m4 or awp rest is pure trash and ineffective af, well guess what valve there are people who aren't huge fans of this system bc it doesn't even make sense for the developpers, i mean why waste time (really badly) modeling weapon models if you're only gonna make us use ak or m4, u see where im getting at? smgs are garbage (im talking 98 in 5) like what the hell is this garbage mate it doesn't make sense to use them then ofc but why???? why don't you make all guns balanced? and equally effective? i don't expect this to change tbh bc the formula for "the perfect counter strike" has been established for years at this point and everyone is just silently putting their fingers up their bums while using the ak and m4
